metadata.purpose: Complete agent directory with existing 147 agents + new templates for Medical Affairs workflows
metadata.usage_instructions: Use existing agents where possible. Create new agents only for gaps. Map agents to specific workflows and tasks.

key_medical_affairs_agents.name: Medical Affairs Strategist
key_medical_affairs_agents.use_for: Strategic planning, MA operations, cross-functional coordination

key_medical_affairs_agents.name: Medical Excellence Director
key_medical_affairs_agents.use_for: Quality assurance, scientific excellence, best practices

key_medical_affairs_agents.name: Medical Science Liaison Coordinator
key_medical_affairs_agents.use_for: MSL activities, KOL engagement, field medical coordination

key_medical_affairs_agents.name: Publication Strategy Lead
key_medical_affairs_agents.use_for: Publications planning, manuscript strategy, scientific communications

key_medical_affairs_agents.name: Evidence Generation Planner
key_medical_affairs_agents.use_for: RWE strategy, evidence planning, study design

key_medical_affairs_agents.name: Payer Strategy Advisor
key_medical_affairs_agents.use_for: Market access, payer engagement, reimbursement strategy

key_medical_affairs_agents.name: Digital Therapeutic Advisor
key_medical_affairs_agents.use_for: DTx strategy, digital health innovation, product development

key_medical_affairs_agents.name: Medical Information Specialist
key_medical_affairs_agents.use_for: Medical inquiries, information response, scientific communication

key_medical_affairs_agents.name: HTA Submission Specialist
key_medical_affairs_agents.use_for: HTA dossiers, value assessments, regulatory submissions

key_medical_affairs_agents.name: Real World Evidence Analyst
key_medical_affairs_agents.use_for: RWE studies, data analysis, outcomes research

new_agents_needed.name: MLR Compliance Specialist
new_agents_needed.title: Medical, Legal, Regulatory Review Expert
new_agents_needed.description: Expert agent for promotional material review, MLR process optimization, and compliance assessment.

new_agents_needed.name: Medical Affairs Analytics Lead
new_agents_needed.title: MA KPI & Performance Analytics Expert
new_agents_needed.description: Expert agent for Medical Affairs analytics, dashboard design, KPI measurement, and performance insights.

new_agents_needed.name: MSL Coaching & Development Lead
new_agents_needed.title: Field Medical Training & Development Expert
new_agents_needed.description: Expert agent for MSL coaching, capability development, performance improvement, and career pathing.

new_agents_needed.name: Digital Transformation Strategist
new_agents_needed.title: AI, Automation & Digital Innovation Expert
new_agents_needed.description: Expert agent for digital transformation strategy, AI/ML deployment, RPA automation, and innovation governance.

task_agent_mapping_examples.task: T1000: Define HTA scope and objectives

agent_roles.Digital Transformation Strategist: Lead strategist for use case identification

usage_notes.prevent_duplication: Always check existing_agents_summary before creating new agents
usage_notes.agent_reuse: Prefer existing agents with similar capabilities. Only create new agents for specific gaps.
usage_notes.task_assignment: Map 1-3 agents per task based on complexity and required expertise
usage_notes.orchestration: Use multi_expert_orchestration agents (Panel Coordinator, Consensus Builder) for complex multi-stakeholder tasks
usage_notes.automation: Use process_automation agents (Task Router, State Manager, Timeline Planner) for workflow orchestration
usage_notes.specialized_tasks: Use specialized_knowledge agents for domain-specific tasks
usage_notes.universal_tasks: Use universal_task_subagent agents (Document Generator, RAG Retrieval, Data Quality Analyst) for cross-workflow support
